description:
Leader of the rebel movement on the planet Trydetol. He meets up with Daba and the others and becomes a key ally of Daba`s in the rebellion as it increases in size.

Semuj is actually a spy for Full Flat, but when this becomes known Daba forgives him and allows him to remain with the rebel movement as Semuj had become dedicated to its cause.
name: Semuj Shato
